title: #484 Cookies Crumble But They Don't Fall Down with Mike Cannon & Brendan Sagalow
itunes:title: Cookies Crumble But They Don't Fall Down with Mike Cannon & Brendan Sagalow
description:
Mike Cannon and Brendan Sagalow are on the pod this week talking about Cannon's new crowd work special "Huge Mistake." He took 150mg of edibles and then went on stage and talked to the crowd at New York Comedy Club. The only reason Brendan is on was because I forgot he was on not that long ago... Stay tuned at the end of the episode to hear our new stand-up catchphrases.

Thanks to our sponsors! Go to BetterHelp.com/Ari for 10% off your first month of counseling, and hit up 3Chi.com for 5% off delta 8 products with code "Ari"

The Music:

Sherryl Crow - My Favorite Mistake

Lily Allen - Everything is Wonderful

Green Day - Time of Your Life

The Donnas - It Takes One To Know One
